name: Connectza
overview:
Connectza is a software product and services marketing company , with website reviews and client engagement as the primary aim.

Connectza realized that software sellers and buyers have almost no place where they can come together and interact with each other to come to the most optimal solution for their IT needs.

So apart from Job post and Job apply(Coming in the next version), both the marketers and the buyers can interact, showcase their skills and convince more clients.

There is a review process as well for websites. A website owner can come in and can register his site and the users can provide valuable feedback and review which will be helpful for the user. The website owner will also have the option to promote his website through connectza.
